segments.text: Excuse me , Miss . I feel like vomiting . Can I bother you for some ice water , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , sir . But can I suggest a cup of warm water instead , I think it may help settle your stomach down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can find an airsick bag in the seat pocket in front of you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much for your kindness .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are welcome . I'll be back with the warm water in a minute .
segments.speaker: S2
